snippet: A new method of treating mental disorders was reported on July 6, 1940, by The New York Times, which chronicled its initial uses, decline and return.
abstract: New York Times first mentioned electric shock therapy, or what is now known as electroconvulsive therapy, as means of treating mental disorders on July 6, 1940.
